item.title: “Build Your Own” M365 Copilot DPIA templates for public sector and enterprise organizations
item.description: In April, Microsoft launched our “Build Your Own” Data Protection Impact Assessment templates for Office 365 as part of our commitment to helping our customers embrace new cutting-edge technologies while providing the information they need to continue to meet their compliance obligations. Today, we’re excited to expand that commitment into the era of AI, as we share our new “Build Your Own” Data Protection Impact Assessment templates for Microsoft’s AI-powered productivity service, Microsoft 365 Copilot. These “Build Your Own” DPIAs—for both public sector and enterprise customers—are customi...
